attributes.comment:
The necessity to increase a fee as substantially as is being suggested is un-
necessary to provide these services. While it is expected that fees for services,
whether governmental or private sector, will increase over time, justifying such and
increase is unfounded.

The proposal of an almost 66% increase to fees for adoption related
documentation can put adoption out the reach of many people. This increase
places an additional financial burden on what is already a relatively expenses
process.

Please reconsider the proposed rate increase for immigration
documentation/services pertaining to adoption.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Louise Spera
